original_title: Dois Garotos Que Se Afastaram Demais do Sol
overview: In the cold of the United States, Emile and Kid are two Afro-Caribbean kids who are part of the world of success and live by codes they don't control. In a terrifying ring, champions fight their own ghosts, creating self-defense devices that imprison them even more. And in a bloody fight, they will use their fists to conquer the dream of freedom, but one's victory depends on the other's failure.
title: Dois Garotos Que Se Afastaram Demais do Sol
